item.title: 高盛策略师 2024 年发出的 "跳出美股看美股 "的号召依然有效
item.description:
彼得-奥本海默（Peter Oppenheimer）是去年最早建议分散投资美国市场的人之一。【原文：

Peter Oppenheimer was among the first to recommend diversifying away from US last year.

】

item.title: 租金上涨提升伦敦西区房东估值
item.description: 伦敦旅游中心地带不断上涨的租金推高了 Shaftesbury Capital Plc 投资组合的价值。【原文：Rising rents across London’s tourist heartlands pushed up the value of Shaftesbury Capital Plc’s portfolio.】

item.title: 沙特食品科技初创企业融资 6400 万美元，迈向 2027 年上市之路
item.description: 沙特食品科技初创公司 Calo 已获得 6400 万美元的 B 轮融资，该公司的业务已扩展到中东以外地区，目标是在 2027 年之前上市。【原文：Saudi foodtech startup Calo has raised $64 million in Series B funding as the company expands beyond the Middle East and aims for a public listing by 2027.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将上涨，关注巴克莱和 Astra 财报
Orange 销售额持平，非洲的增长抵消了法国的下降
item.description: Orange SA 表示，非洲和中东地区的强劲增长抵消了法国的下滑，使该电信运营商得以小幅上调今年的业绩展望。【原文：Orange SA said strong growth in Africa and the Middle East offset declines in France and allowed the telecom provider to slightly raise its outlook for the year.】

item.title: 夏季高温令亚洲煤炭价格攀升至 2 月份以来最高点
item.description: 炎热的夏季天气促进了空调需求，并减少了过剩的库存，亚洲煤炭价格基准升至五个月来的最高点。【原文：Asia’s coal price benchmark rose to a five-month high after hot summer weather boosted demand for air conditioning and reduced brimming inventories.】

item.title: 中美贸易休战有望延长，铁矿石上涨
item.description: 由于中美贸易休战可能延长的消息缓解了人们对关税对全球经济影响的担忧，铁矿石出现反弹。【原文：Iron ore rebounded as news of a possible extension to the US-China trade truce eased some concerns about the impacts of tariffs on the global economy.】

item.title: 中国创纪录的贸易额遭遇五月以来的首个大滑坡
item.description: 中国的贸易创下了近三个月来最差的一周，这表明今年创纪录的贸易量可能开始放缓。【原文：China’s trade had its worst week in almost three months, a sign this year’s record-breaking volumes may be starting to slow.】

item.title: 现在看看美联储如何应对所有压力
item.description:
特朗普效应应该不会导致裁员，尽管可能会有一些健康的异议。【原文：

The Trump effect shouldn’t lead to a cut, though there may be some healthy dissent.

】

item.title: 2008 年危机的 "恶棍 "在欧洲推动增长的过程中获得新生
item.description: 2008 年金融危机爆发后，证券化在一定程度上扮演了 "恶棍 "的角色，使其成为欧洲的长期弃儿。【原文：In the wake of the 2008 financial crisis, the role of villain partly fell on securitization, turning it into a long-term pariah in Europe.】

item.title: 中国人民银行发现，即使经济增长，消费者情绪也在转暗
item.description: 中国央行的一项调查显示，中国家庭在上一季度变得更加悲观，他们对就业市场的看法降至有史以来最差，这让人担心，中国经济在今年大部分时间里的增长速度都超过了政府的目标，未来可能会放缓。【原文：Chinese households became more pessimistic last quarter and their view of the jobs market fell to the worst ever, according to a survey by the central bank, a worry for an economy that risks a slowdown ahead after growing faster than the government’s target for much of this year.】

item.title: 日本两年期债券销售吸引 10 月以来最强劲需求
item.description: 日本周二的两年期国债拍卖吸引了自 10 月份以来最强劲的需求，因为投资者被接近 2008 年以来最高水平的债券收益率所吸引。【原文：Japan’s two-year government bond auction Tuesday drew the strongest demand since October as investors were attracted to bond yields that have approached the highest since 2008.】

item.title: 格里尔称美国需要与印度就贸易协议进行更多谈判
item.description: 美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）说，就在8月1日提高关税的最后期限前几天，还需要与印度就贸易协议进行 "更多谈判"。【原文：US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer said “more negotiations” will be needed with India on a trade deal just days before an Aug. 1 deadline for higher tariffs.】

item.title: MSCI 印度指数大幅逆转，落后于新兴市场同类指数
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 苹果有史以来首次关闭中国零售店
item.description: 苹果公司将首次关闭在中国的零售店，这标志着这家 iPhone 制造商在努力重振销售的中国市场上的明显退缩。【原文：Apple Inc. is closing a retail store in China for the first time, marking a notable retreat in a market where the iPhone maker is striving to revive sales.】

item.title: 中国社会支出达到近二十年来最高水平
item.description: 中国的政府支出已转向社会福利，其程度至少是一代人所未见的，因为中国的预算赤字创下了历史新高，其重点是促进消费，以减轻唐纳德-特朗普的关税带来的打击。【原文：China’s government spending has pivoted toward social welfare to a degree unseen for at least a generation, as it runs a record budget deficit with a focus on boosting consumption to cushion the blow from Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 随着苹果公司的转变，大多数在美国销售的手机现在都由印度制造了
item.description: 在苹果公司转向在南亚国家组装更多 iPhone 之后，印度已超过中国，成为美国智能手机销售的最大来源国。【原文：India has overtaken China to become the top source of smartphones sold in the US, after Apple Inc. shifted to assemble more of its iPhones in the South Asian country.】

item.title: 亿万富翁王健林的 HPL 公司寻求减持新加坡零售地带的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，陷入困境的亿万富翁王明成（Ong Beng Seng）旗下的房地产公司正寻求减持其在新加坡乌节路购物带两处大型资产中的股份。【原文：The property firm of embattled billionaire Ong Beng Seng is looking to reduce its stakes in two marquee assets along Singapore’s Orchard Road shopping strip, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国加密货币公司比特大陆（Bitmain）计划在美国建立首家工厂，与特朗普展开博弈
item.description: 全球最大的加密货币挖矿硬件制造商比特大陆科技有限公司（Bitmain Technologies Ltd.）计划在未来几个月内开设其在美国的第一家工厂，这是在数字资产 "美国制造 "热潮中的一个战略支点。【原文：Bitmain Technologies Ltd., the world’s largest manufacturer of crypto mining hardware, plans to open its first US facility in the coming months, a strategic pivot riding the “Made in America” boom in digital assets.】

item.title: 美国资产失去吸引力，台湾投资者转向欧洲
item.description: 台湾投资者正在重新评估他们长期以来对美元资产的偏好，将赌注转向欧洲，这是全球投资者远离美元的最新举措。【原文：Taiwanese investors are reassessing their long-held preference for US-dollar assets, shifting their bets to Europe in the latest move by global investors away from the greenback.】

item.title: 富达称美联储缩表和美元下跌可能导致黄金价格达到 4,000 美元
item.description: 据富达国际（Fidelity International）称，随着美联储降低利率以缓解美国经济，美元汇率下跌，各国央行不断扩大黄金持有量，到明年年底，黄金价格可能会达到每盎司4000美元。【原文：Gold could hit $4,000 an ounce by the end of next year as the Federal Reserve lowers interest rates to cushion the US economy, the dollar drops, and central banks keep expanding holdings, according to Fidelity International.】

item.title: 联合太平洋公司竞购诺福克南方公司的价值约为每股 320 美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，联合太平洋公司（Union Pacific Corp. ）即将就以股票加现金的方式收购诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern Corp.【原文：Union Pacific Corp. is nearing an agreement for a stock-and-cash deal for Norfolk Southern Corp. that would value the smaller rival at about $320 a share, people familiar with the matter said, in what would be the rail industry’s biggest-ever tie-up.】

item.title: 美欧贸易协定提振美元，黄金止跌回升
item.description: 在美国与欧盟达成关税协议后，美元创下 5 月份以来最大涨幅，投资者目前正关注华盛顿与中国政府之间延长贸易休战的前景，黄金维持跌势。【原文：Gold held a decline after the dollar rose the most since May following a tariff deal between the US and the European Union, with investors now focusing on prospects for an extension of a trade truce between Washington and Beijing.】

item.title: 拉塔姆航空公司第二季度利润飙升，上调指导目标
item.description: 在第二季度净收入因强劲的旅行需求和较低的航空燃油价格而大幅增长之后，拉美航空再次上调了全年业绩展望。【原文：Latam Airlines increased its outlook again for the full year after second-quarter net income surged on robust travel demand and lower jet fuel prices.】

item.title: 耗资 1000 亿美元建设东南亚超级电网背后的隐藏障碍
item.description:
老挝山区的一个项目使该地区离庞大的互联能源网络更近了一步

。【原文：

A project in the mountains of Laos is bringing the region one step closer to a vast, interconnected energy network

】

item.title: 中国的煤炭管道有可能造成过剩，破坏气候目标
item.description: 据《全球能源观察》报道，中国拟议的煤矿开发项目有可能造成供过于求，破坏气候目标。【原文：China’s proposed coal mine developments risk creating an oversupply and derailing climate goals, according to Global Energy Monitor.】

item.title: 特朗普通俄期限引发供应担忧，石油保持涨势
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普敦促俄罗斯迅速与乌克兰达成停战协议，否则将面临潜在的经济惩罚，这引发了人们对欧佩克+产油国原油供应可能中断的担忧，此后石油保持上涨。【原文：Oil held a gain after President Donald Trump pushed for Russia to reach a swift truce with Ukraine or face potential economic penalties, raising concerns crude supplies from the OPEC+ producer could be disrupted.】

item.title: 简街将辩称零售需求推动其印度交易
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，简街集团（Jane Street Group LLC）预计将辩称，其备受争议的印度期权交易是对散户投资者超额需求的回应。【原文：Jane Street Group LLC is expected to argue that its controversial Indian options trades were a response to outsized demand from retail investors, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Waymo 和 Avis 计划在达拉斯推出机器人出租车，并达成多年协议
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下 Waymo 公司计划明年与 Avis Budget Group Inc. 合作在达拉斯推出机器人出租车服务。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Waymo plans to launch robotaxi service in Dallas next year in partnership with Avis Budget Group Inc., a push by the autonomous car company to diversify beyond its relationship with Uber Technologies Inc. to further expand across the US.】

item.title: 优步称纽约市快递新规 "歧视 "移民工人
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. ）对纽约市要求送货应用程序工人在反光背心上显示公司颁发的身份证号码的新提案提出反驳，称该提案 "挑出 "移民工人，"加强监视和控制"。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is pushing back on a new NYC proposal requiring delivery app workers to display company-issued identification numbers on reflective vests, saying it “singles out” immigrant workers for “heightened surveillance and control.”】
